body.name: Krib Bling Full-Automatic Washing Machine with LED Display, 17.7 lbs Portable Compact Laundry Washer with Drain Pump, 10 Wash Programs 8 Water Levels, Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Automatic Imbalance Adjustment】Other portable washer would be violent shaking and vibrating while washing or spinning. But our laundry washing machine would initiate its imbalance adjustment system to handle this kind of situation, thus ensure the safety and reduce noise.

【Full Automatic Washer】 This portable washing machine is designed as a 2 in 1 compact washer. All you need to do is selecting the washing & spinning program and water level, then the mini laundry washer could work alone without your constant attention. This could save your time and you could do something more important.

【Portable and Space Saving】Our washing machine won’t take much space, thus making it an ideal choice for households with limit space, such as RV, Camping, Dorm and Apartments. You could easily store it. And you also don’t need to assemble this washer much before usage, hassle-free and easy to operate.

【Large Capacity for Family】The inner tub of this portable washer could load 15.6 lbs of clothes at one time, which is suitable for family of 3-4 members. The reference weight for all types of clothes would also be highlighted in the description and pictures. This washing machine would help you save more energy and efforts.

【Multi-functional Control Panel】There’ re 10 washing programs, 4 water level mode and 8 water level selections on the control panel of the full automatic washing machine, which is convenient. LED display could clearly show the laundry time. And the child lock also ensure the normal operation of the washing machine while protecting the safety of your family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The washing machine I received has internal damage. What should I do? Our mailbox is on the outer package. You can tell me about the washing machine and send us photos. We usually process mail and in-mail messages within 24 hours. The protection bracket in the washing machine is damaged. What should I do? The protection bracket in the washing machine does not affect the use of the washing machine. You can tear it down. Its function is to protect the internal parts of the washing machine during transportation. I chose to AA soak, but the washing machine didn't work. What should I do? If immersion is selected, the washing machine will not start working properly until the clothes have been soaked for 15 minutes. Can the washing machine wash clothes in hot water? The washing machine can wash clothes in hot water. But pay attention to the fabric. Some materials will deform and fade if washed in hot water, which will also reduce the effect of laundry detergent. There is abnormal noise in the washing machine. How should I handle it? Please note: If the clothes are not evenly placed, the inner clothes cannot be dried during the drying process and there will be abnormal sound of clothes hitting the washing machine barrel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Both my washer & dryer blew out 5 months ago... problem with the power.... we think rats... have been researching compact systems since my space is small. The only set i could find was $950 per piece. THEN i found this Krib Bling Full-Automatic Washing Machine with LED Display, 17.7 lbs Portable Compact Washer. Just did the first 2 loads. AMAZING!! They fully test the units for leaks and operation as part of the manufacturing process .. [i'd bought another style before this one and it leaked like a sieve] THIS WASHER IS GREAT... Very quiet, Large metal drum, agitator moves the clothes around well, fit 5 bath towels in the first load... they spun super dry... uses HE liquid or powder detergent. I highly recommend this washer. This unit + a compact dryer only cost me $500 total. Including electrician costs, a larger washer & dryer set would have been close to $3000. But I'm good!!! This is totally a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact in any Household!
reviews.reviewText: I used to have my clothes washed at an outside laundromat, but I was always worried about hygiene problems, especially nowadays. To combat this, I decided to invest in a washing machine and this one made by Krib Bling was the winner for me. It's pretty compact, meaning I can place this inside my living room and not have it take too much space which is huge for anyone living in a small footprint. It can wash a huge load at a time, I read around 17 pounds which is insane! Lastly, unlike the ones in the laundromat, this one purrs like a kitten and is super quiet! Definitely worth the investment for any small household.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Leaks! Does not drain properly
reviews.reviewText: I just received this Krib Bling Washer today. As I was setting it up I noticed the screw inside the machine was rusted. I tried cleaning it off which pretty much worked. Decided to try it out. Not only did it leak from the connectors it leaked out from the machine itself all over the floor. The pump does not work well and now the machine still has water in it. Returning asap. After writing the review I spoke with amazon who said I would receive a refund no need to return because of the water in the machine and my fear of it leaking in my car. After waiting the 7-10 days still no refund and they are saying I need to return. I luckily kept the machine because I wanted to make sure I didn’t throw it out before receiving the return. I believe this company will again sell this defective item. Customer Beware! And I’m disappointed in amazons customer service as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works remarkably well and drains well and fast.. I am content..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A few Things To Consider before making your Portable/Compact Clothes Washer purchase!
reviews.reviewText: While I'm generally a careful buyer, thinking things out and researching products first, I still wound up buying several portable / compact clothes washers before getting here; maybe I can help you avoid doing the same. Portable/compact washers come in a variety of configurations and features; some options/choices are pretty up-front and obvious- but some are not. Planning to use mine at work and in my small camping trailer I was mainly focused on compact size, low water & power usage, a strong spin-dry, and of course doing a good job of cleaning. This first led to purchase of a machine with a separate spin/wash tub with emphasis on it's having 2 motors and a drain pump vs. gravity drain. #1- If it's a 2-tub machine it's semi-automatic and likely no water valve control. #2- Including a drain pump is better than none, but even the best of them is more of an "assist"- not very aggressive. Time moving loads between tubs was not an issue- manual water control for wash, then rinse, then during spin was. Moving into a single tub, full automatic was a much better choice for me. Auto valve-controlled water input more like a traditional full-size machine is a real plus, as is the digital control with multiple wash setting options. While I was left a bit skeptical at first about purchase of a unit with a name like "Krib Bling", I shouldn't have been; this machine has performed extremely well right from the start. No leaks, no function errors, no problems with operation at all. Even better- the Krib Bling machine is very pleasantly quiet running in all phases of operation. For myself, there's only 2 areas of shortcoming from being ideal; one probably resolved in future models, with the other no doubt improved: 1. Addition of an intermittent water spray during the spin cycle would be nice; maybe not included here due potential of unbalancing operation, and haven't found this included with any other portable machines, either. 2. While just 38 lb. it's a little cumbersome to move around frequently. Placement and size of the hand grip areas could improve the portability, but they're certainly not a downfall as is. Overall, the 17.7 lb capacity Krib Bling Fully Automatic Portable Washer has proven to be the right choice for my needs, and has surpassed all other portables I have found!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Okay washing machine
reviews.reviewText: Item is definitely perfect for small spaces, but its a bit heavy to move around. At first the washer wasn't making any noise, but after a few washes it got so loud and it started to smell like something electric was burning. I do like that it's big to put a few things, but don't overfill. It does have a few settings for different types of clothing. After a few months of owning this machine, my clothing is starting to make small tear marks, wish I could return to be honest

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After 1.5 years of using this product I’m still amazed by it quality and efficiency
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Simple to use, you just have to connect the cable with your sink and it has many different modes for many types of cleaning options and although it doesn’t look so big which makes it very compact. I keep it in my room’s wardrobe and I just connect to my bathroom when I need to use - I separately bought a suitable carrying car that I only move it with it so I don’t have to drag it every time as it is a bit heavy but is perfect if you don’t have the space or can’t for some reason have an usual laundry machine. In fact, even if you do is an interesting option because of it portability and large capacity of laundry space. Also, it is a very silent and stable machine, so when it starts to spin fast to dry it manage to stay very firm which is another pro point. I so far never had any problem and 100% recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy buena la lavadora
reviews.reviewText: Es muy buena, sobre todo en los apartamentos pequeños
